CustomField.description: This cross object formula is used to retrieve the "Type" value from the related Service Resource record, in order to use this as a filter criteria in the "Work Complete Review" flow in get elements to lookup only Service Resources of the Type "Technician". This is required to enable the flow to show a data table of all Service Resources and their total labour time as a preview on how many Labour Lines will be created after the flow finishes.
CustomField.label: Service Resource Type
